cause.description:
If anyone in this world needs to die it has to be Scott Stapp. Fred Dalton Thompson has declared that if he wins the presidential race, he'll have him executed. And why would he lie he's on Law & Order. He could easily be described as the Holocaust of musicians....scratch that I'm going to go out on a limb here Holocaust > Scott Stapp
1. Scott Stapp must die
cause.mission: find a way to murder Scott Stapp the lead singer of shit-rick band Creed
cause.name: Get Scott Stapp Killied
